title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5001.5 - Minimum compensation rate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5001.5 - Minimum compensation rate

State Regulations

The retirement board shall exclude as a basis for service
credit or as a basis for eligibility for benefit, or as a basis for membership
in the system, any service rendered at a compensation rate less than that
established by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5001.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
